title: A Winter's Solstice, Vol. 5
description:
Yet another in Windham Hill's serious of Holiday albums.  Despite the review below, they produced at least two more.  Ripped from the CD at 256kbs, mp3 with thumb of cover art.

 	 Album Review:
	  	
In what has become a tired (albeit profitable) theme, the Windham Hill recording company offers A Winter's Solstice V. The performances are fine, as expected, and the overall mood is both quiet and reflective; however, one has to wonder how many Winter Solstice's one needs.
- Authored By Robert Taylor
